mapper.select: select c.seq ,c.ccg_seq ,(select cg.code_group_name from tb_ccg cg where 1=1 and c.ccg_seq = cg.seq) code_group_name ,c.seq ,c.seq ,c.code_name ,c.code_name_en ,c.use_ny ,c.sort ,c.reg_date ,c.mod_date from tb_cc c where 1=1 and cg.reg_date between #{sh_start_date} and #{sh_end_date} and cg.mod_date between #{sh_start_date} and #{sh_end_date} <where and
